name: Parsagon
long_description:
Parsagon uses AI to monitor and analyze events from sources across the web. You can use Parsagon to:

- Collect data on mergers and acquisitions in the news
- Monitor press releases from state and local governments
- Get alerts when bills related to a certain topic are proposed
- And much more!

Just tell Parsagon what types of events you want to monitor, and our AI will find what's relevant to you.
one_liner: Parsagon monitors sources across the web using AI
